entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -22.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 04:00 AM MDT Thursday 28 April 2016
Condition: Freezing Fog

Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -24.8°C

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Thursday 28 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Thursday 28 April 2016

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 6. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Thursday 28 April 2016
